name: Ambient Sleeping Pill - Dark Mode
description:
I grew tired of seeing all of that white and made a simple dark mode for everyone's favorite relaxing radio station! This also goes well with my minimal design of this website:

https://userstyles.org/styles/136194/ambient-sleeping-pill-minimalism
obsoletion_message: Website now includes built-in night mdoe
additional_info:
v1.1: Restored content, now that stream is working. Will fix colors in next update.

v1.0: Out of Beta. Removed unnecessary content for the time being.

v0.9: Added optional backgrounds (configure in source code).

v0.8: Adjusted the style of the alert box.

v0.7: Softened the contrast and added slight opacity.

v0.6: Inverted a few boxes.

v0.5: Now in beta. There are still some things I want to fix.
